name: Bug Aviators in Theme Park
description: This is the game to attempt to recreate the realities having been in dreams of the creator. You can venture in the dreamy world of the handcrafted figures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 64bits or later Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
